comment: The main text box containing the characters and annotations from the 'Shuowen Jiezi' (说文解字) in seal script and small regular script, arranged vertically with columns of characters and their pronunciations (using '切' - qie method). The title '說文解字第十一' is prominently displayed at the top center. The right margin contains page numbers ('小二百十七') and other editorial markings.
